class.name: StandardButton
class.author: Christopher Swenson
class.description: Wrapper class around the a div that works as a button

constructor.param: style data to pass to the button

event.name: onClick
event.description: Fires when the button is clicked

event.name: onMouseOver
event.description: Fires when the cursor is over the button

event.name: onMouseOut
event.description: Fires when the cursor leaves the button
